attributes.action: Campaign for a televised debate between Alex Salmond and David Cameron on the future of Scotland
attributes.additional_details:
As a resident in Scotland, I think it's of the utmost importance that a live television debate between The Prime Minister David Cameron and the First Minister of Scotland Alex Salmond take place before the forthcoming referendum on the 18th Sept 2014.
This on the basis of the decisions being asked of the voters in the referendum, need further information from the UK Prime Minister and the Scottish First Minister, with such a potentially life changing decision ahead.
